topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Fractals and Procedural Generation

name: Fraqtive
short_description: Fraqtive is an open source, multi-platform generator of the Mandelbrot family fractals. It uses very fast algorithms supporting SSE2 and multi-core processors. It generates high quality anti-aliased images and renders 3D scenes using OpenGL. It allows real-time navigation and dynamic generation of the Julia fractal preview.
